args: So, Xuan Zang, how long were you\nplanning on following me around?
Until I have ascertained the merits of\nyour behavior.
The prince has asked you to journey to\na mountain village and offer them aid.
I would see for myself how you carry\nyourself during this task.
But, like...using Qilin relics to help people\nisn't that bad, is it?

...No, I cannot assert that it is ＂bad.＂
Yet the power of the relics is too much to
wield in the pursuit of simple aid, and
thus I find myself of two minds about it.
You are aware of what fate befell our Qilin\nancestors, yes?

Their use of relics saw them fall into
decadence, which became the catalyst
for a great calamity that could have
destroyed the entire world.
...Sure, way back then, that probably DID\nall go down. But you know, I've got some\nthoughts on the matter.
What happened was the fault of the people\nthemselves. Not the Qilin relics.

It's all about how you USE a tool. If we use
the relics to help the world—to help other
people—surely that can't possibly result
in some global catastrophe, right?
Plus, I'M the one using the relics, and I'm\na total genius! Everything's gonna be just\nfine. Hee hee!
I worry about that prideful nature\nof yours, too.

It's true that tools are only as useful or
dangerous as their wielder allows—which
is precisely why Qilin practice such strict
discipline with them.
Ugh! I heard enough of these lectures\nback in the village!
I... I'm sensing a Qilin relic!
Perhaps there was one abandoned here?\nWe must investigate!
So it WAS an abandoned Qilin relic.\nLet us retrieve it, and quickly.
Wait...what's up with this flow of mana?\nIt's running from the relic, and the\nmountain is—AGH!
Stop! Don't move it, Xuan Zang!
I think it's the only thing keeping the\nvolcano from erupting! If we were to take\nit away, the whole thing'd blow its top!
That would spell disaster for the\nnearby village...!
What a mess... It is the Sealer's mission\nto retrieve Qilin relics. Once we've found\none, we cannot simply leave it be...
Surely there's some way to deal with this.\nA way to retrieve the relic AND prevent the\nvolcano from erupting...
How about this: we sub in a different relic\nto deal with the volcano.
We ought to use one that'll hold it back,\nor one that makes sure it doesn't harm\nthe village even if it DOES erupt!
Use a relic to render the eruption\nimpotent? Hmm...
Is it that crazy? What if we just repeated\nwhat you did with the multiplying bread\nand sucked up all the lava like that?
You mean with the Hong Hulu? Hmm...\nThat would prove a challenge, I think.
It is not the relic's originally intended use.\nAdjusting it to do that would be a\ngargantuan task.
Hmm, true. Bread is one thing, but lava's\nno joke.
I confess, I'm not certain we possess a\nrelic properly suited to this particular\nsituation...
If we don't have a relic that can sort\nout the volcano, then we should just\nMAKE one!
MAKE a Qilin relic?! You speak of the\nimpossible!

Sure, making one from scratch would be
tough, but if we were to modify one of the
relics we already have, I think we could
manage it!
MODIFY a Qilin relic?! S-such actions are\nstrictly forbidden! I could never overlook\nsuch a transgression!
Who knows what manner of calamity we\ncould invite were we to fail!
You're not wrong. I messed up this one\ntime and got myself into a reeeal pickle!
Do you mean to say you have modified\na relic before?!
Yep, sure did. And I think I got the hang of\nit from that, so the next time I do it, it'll\nbe fine!
So, if we're not gonna try and STOP the\neruption, I could take this one...\nand that one...and then...
I cannot even fathom what you're thinking,\nJiang Ziya...
The same thing I'm always thinking, duh!
I want to help people with Qilin relics!
Hee hee! I'm excited now! This must be\nhow the ancient Qilin craftspeople felt\nwhen they made relics.
＂Excited＂ seems rather light a word to\ndescribe our tribe's exalted craftspeople...
Maybe. I know it seems like the relics\ndrove everyone to depravity, but that\ncame at the end—as a result of it all.
The people who actually made them\ncouldn't have been TRYING to aim for\nsuch a nasty outcome, y'know?

They were probably like, ＂Hey, wouldn't it
be nice if I could do this?＂ Or, ＂Oh, if I
could do that kind of thing, it would be
super convenient...＂
They were building things that could\nmake dreams reality! It's ridiculously,\nheart-poundingly exciting!
Tools to make dreams reality, hm...?
And donezo! I've combined the Cloth of\nReversal with the Replicator Dew!
It causes a thing to be reduced by halves,\nsteadily returning it to its original state...\nIn other words, it'll make stuff disappear!
If we just add a drop to the lava, it should\nget rid of it in no time flat—along with\nthe smoke and fumes!
That... That's incredible! If such a thing\ncould be done, it truly WOULD be like a\ndream come true!
Ah, I see now. This heart-pounding\nsensation...
I understand at last. It is your heart from\nwhence this passion springs.
You are no mere proud fool, Jiang Ziya.
Your eyes are ever fixed on what lies\nahead. You are a great trailblazer who\ngoes forth into the future...
That's just common sense, ain't it? Folks\ndon't have eyes in the back of their head,\nafter all.

That is...not quite what I meant.
*sigh* I suppose there's a fine line
between genius and...well, something
else.
Did you just call me a genius?\nStooop, you're embarrassing me!
*sigh* Honestly, I am truly astonished that\nthere could be a person like you among us\nQilin, bound as we are to the past...

I am actually a bit jealous, in truth. You
have the buoyancy of spirit needed to forge
onward, rather than getting mired in the
muck of overthought...
Very well, then! I would take this plunge\nwith you. Let us wager everything on this\nnew Qilin relic of yours!

O power universal of the Qilin, be bound
by my solemn decree. Glowing embers,
coursing amid bedrock. Subdued eruption!
Be your exertions henceforth suppressed!
Relic retrieved! Your turn, Jiang Ziya!
You got it! I'll just put a drop of the\nReductor Dew into the volcano's mouth...

O power universal of the Qilin, be bound
by my solemn decree!  Rooted solution!
Course upstream against the natural order!
Strong and swift may you invoke your gift!
Yes! The lava and smoke are disappearing!
Hee hee! Perfection! I really AM\na total genius!
Thank you. Because of you, I was able to\nsafely fulfill my duty as a sealer.
And now I understand the way you use\nthe Qilin relics.
Truth be told, I am impressed that such\nmultifaceted potential exists within them.
Right? Like I said, tools come down to how\nyou use 'em. The Qilin relics are all about\nhelping the world and the people in it!
Yes, it is as you say. However...
Please only use Qilin relics to help people\nwhile you're within my sight.
Your behavior will not soon be understood\nby other Qilin tribespeople.
Thus, I'd like to protect you from any such\nmisunderstandings.
I see... So that's what you had in mind.

In that case, you're more than welcome,
as far as I'm concerned! I bet you could
help me out if/when I screw up using
a relic again, hee hee!
Could we perhaps NOT operate under the\nassumption that another such error is\ninevitable?
Hee hee! You and me are gonna do\ngreat things together, Xuan Zang!
